meanings.sent1: We need to reshingle our house before the rainy season.
meanings.sent2: The roofers will reshingle the entire roof next week.
meanings.sent3: I tried to reshingle my dog's house, but he kept stealing the shingles!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a warm sunbeam reshingling the gloomy room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of hammers reshingling the roof echoed through the neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To replace shingles on a roof.
meanings.sent1: It's time to reshingle the old roof to prevent leaks.
meanings.sent2: The workers will reshingle the damaged area of the roof first.
meanings.sent3: The raccoons thought it was a fun game to reshingle the roof every night.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a fresh breeze reshingling the worn-out roof of her heart.
meanings.sent5: The storm had passed, leaving the need to reshingle the roof as a reminder of its fury.
